results.title: How the Path to Homeownership Runs Through Mexico

results.title: ‘Parentese’ Is Truly a Lingua Franca, Global Study Finds
results.abstract: In an ambitious cross-cultural study, researchers found that adults around the world speak and sing to babies in similar ways.

media.caption: As part of the study, 50,000 people from 187 countries and representing 199 languages were asked to determine whether a song or a passage of speech was being addressed to a baby or an adult.

results.title: When a Woman’s Retirement Account Becomes the Family Emergency Fund
results.abstract: Women break into their savings to cover all kinds of expenses: home down payments, repairs, medical bills. That can hurt them years later.

media.caption: Vickie Elisa tapped her Roth individual retirement account for home repairs and to help family. “I told myself, once I had built up a pretty good cash flow, I would start building it back up again,” she said.

results.title: After Recent Turmoil, the Race for Texas Governor Is Tightening
results.abstract: A series of tragedies and challenges have soured the mood of Texans and made the governor’s race perhaps the most competitive since the 1990s.

media.caption: Gov. Greg Abbott addressed the 2022 National Rifle Association conference in a prerecorded video in Houston on May 27, three days after the Uvalde school shooting. He and his Democratic challenger, Beto O’Rourke, differ widely on gun control issues.

results.adx_keywords: Baseball;Museums;Civil Rights Movement (1954-68);Robinson, Jackie;Robinson, Rachel;Brooklyn Dodgers
results.byline: By David Waldstein and Elias Williams
results.title: The Jackie Robinson Museum Is About a Lot More Than Baseball
results.abstract: Robinson accomplished a great deal on the field, but a museum celebrating his life — that will have a ribbon-cutting this week — puts as much focus on his civil rights work.

media.caption: David Robinson’s childhood included visits from people like the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. He hopes the Jackie Robinson Museum can honor his father’s priorities.
